content.description:
Sit start with left hand in a fingerpocket/sidepull and right hand on a good sloper with a little finger dish in it.  Tough moves up over the bulge and onto the arete.  Work the arete to the top.  Gets dangerous fast. 

  Look out for the gnarly white spiders !
content.location: This problem sit starts on the northwest corner / arete of the field of dreams boulder.

content.description: The hardest part is getting up to the undercling, then it's easy and fun.   Work the undercling up diagonally and aroud the corner to the top out.
content.location: This problem is on the uphill side of field of dreams boulder.   It's the easiest way on or off the boulder.  Start below the slab with the undercling running diagonally up it.

content.description:
This boulder has four sides to it, all are amazing, all have one or two dominant lines. I will post all the pics I have so you can get an idea.  

  Boulder must be 40 - 50 feet high.
